last_episode_to_air.name: Fall
last_episode_to_air.overview: The trials related to Roberto Maranzano’s murder come to an end, leaving Muccioli exhausted and broken. His health begins to deteriorate drastically.

name: SanPa: Sins of the Savior
original_name: SanPa: luci e tenebre di San Patrignano
overview: Amidst a heroin crisis, Vincenzo Muccioli cared for the addicted, earning him fierce public devotion -- even as charges of violence began to mount.

episodes.name: Birth
episodes.overview: Cheap heroin begins to flood Italy. With the government unable to deal with the damage, Vincenzo Muccioli opens a commune to treat addicted youth.

episodes.name: Growth
episodes.overview: Despite the serious charges against him, Muccioli receives overwhelming support from the public, including many affected by the heroin crisis.

episodes.name: Glory
episodes.overview: As Muccioli’s fame and power grow, San Patrignano also expands beyond his immediate control. The commune struggles to deal with the AIDS epidemic.

episodes.name: Decline
episodes.overview: Natalia's death is followed by another loss, until finally a heinous act of cruelty takes place. Then, Muccioli's driver makes a damning accusation.

episodes.name: Fall
episodes.overview: The trials related to Roberto Maranzano’s murder come to an end, leaving Muccioli exhausted and broken. His health begins to deteriorate drastically.
